official_title: The Longitudinal Relationship of Hydroxyurea Adherence Behavior to Health-related Quality of Life, Barriers to Adherence and Habit Formation in Patients With Sickle Cell Disease.
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 12-21 years old
* Any sickle cell disease genotype
* On steady state of hydroxyurea for 2 months
* Own or have access to a smartphone
* Parents of patients that meet the eligibility criteria and are enrolled in the study will be included
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 12 Years
Must have maximum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients with recent hospitalizations within the past 7 days
